attributes.action: Stop Royal Canin selling food for brachycephalic breeds when they hate them
attributes.background: Royal Canin sell breed specific foods for brachycephalic (short nosed) dogs - for example Bulldogs, Chihauhaus, & French Bulldogs and are more than happy to take our money for ‘breed specific’ food whilst slating the breeding of these breeds at the highest level -  BOYCOTT ROYAL CANIN!!!
